question.pageTitle: Part I: Determining Strategies and Response Plan
question.questionText: Put the following procedures for collecting samples and conducting chemical analysis in the appropriate order.
question.instructionText: Drag each layer name in the right and place it besides its correct description. When you are done, click Submit.

drag_options.drag_option: Collect sample with Quicksilver swabs and scoops
Perform analysis with HHAs and HazMatID
